description: Provides information about the specified custom medical vocabulary. To view the status of the specified custom medical vocabulary, check the VocabularyState field. If the status is READY, your custom vocabulary is available to use. If the status is FAILED, FailureReason provides details on why your vocabulary failed. To get a list of your custom medical vocabularies, use the operation.

parameters.name: VocabularyName
parameters.description: The name of the custom medical vocabulary you want information about. Custom medical vocabulary names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: VocabularyName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom medical vocabulary you requested information about.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code you selected for your custom medical vocabulary. US English ( en-US) is the only language supported with Amazon Transcribe Medical.

nested_items.name: VocabularyState
nested_items.description: The processing state of your custom medical vocabulary. If the state is READY, you can use the custom vocabulary in a StartMedicalTranscriptionJob request.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the specified custom medical vocabulary was last modified.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If VocabularyState is FAILED, FailureReason contains information about why the custom medical vocabulary request failed. See also: Common Errors.

nested_items.name: DownloadUri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location where the specified custom medical vocabulary is stored; use this URI to view or download the custom vocabulary.
